meanings.sent1: The buzzing mosquito kept nettling me all night.
meanings.sent2: The constant noise of the construction work nettled the residents.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten enjoyed nettling the dog by batting its tail.
meanings.sent4: His sarcastic remarks nettled her like a swarm of bees.
meanings.sent5: The persistent sales calls nettled him to the point of frustration.

meanings.sent1: The nettling sound of the dripping faucet was driving her crazy.
meanings.sent2: The nettling behavior of the class clown disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The nettling delay in the traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her nettling habit of interrupting others was quite bothersome.
meanings.sent5: The nettling itch from the bug bite was incredibly irritating.
